author: cms-sw
body: and pass these variables to container. This should fix `FallbackFileOpenError` errors in ROCM_X IBs ( like [this one](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/el8_amd64_gcc12/CMSSW_15_0_ROCM_X_2025-01-19-2300/pyRelValMatrixLogs/run/141.044406_Run3-2023_JetMET2023D_RecoPixelOnlyTripletsGPU/step2_Run3-2023_JetMET2023D_RecoPixelOnlyTripletsGPU.log#/95-95) )
title: Set X509_USER_KEY and X509_USER_CERT for lumi
